name: Nilaa
greetingText: I really like your name btw! (lely)
wishText: I hope you always happy and healthy ;)
text1: Me and my friend wanna say sorry to you :(
textInChatBox: Sorry, we are made a mistake...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
wishHeading: Mohon maafin kita ya.. tadi maaf kalau bercandanya kelewatan terus jadi bikin kamu nambah badmood. (ini ga cukup jadi selebihnya liat di wa aja yaa)
outroText: okay, let me know if you already forgive me
replayText: Or you can click this word, if you want to watch it again.
